tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE visitation_schedule (
  visitation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_id INT,
  child_id INT,
  visitation_date DATE,
  visitation_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE ParentVisitationSchedule (
    parent_id INT,
    child_id INT,
    visitation_date DATE,
    visitation_time TIME,
    PRIMARY KEY (parent_id, child_id, visitation_date)
);

CREATE TABLE visitation_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_id INT,
    child_id INT,
    visitation_date DATE,
    visitation_duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Child (
    child_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    child_dob DATE,
    parent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES Parent(parent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Visitation (
    visitation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    parent_id INT,
    child_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES Parent(parent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (child_id) REFERENCES Child(child_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    week_day VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    time_slot TIME NOT NULL,
    parent_id INT,
    child_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES Parent(parent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (child_id) REFERENCES Child(child_id)
);
